name: IFS 2D
tagline: A simple generator of Iterated Function System fractals in 2D
body:
### Welcome to MatrixCat's IFS_2D GitHub Pages.
This page has been filled in after the automatic page generator did its thing.  I'm still getting my head around github and markdown so please bear with me.  I assume I will find the output of this process under 

```
$ cd ifs_2d/gh-pages
```

### Designer Templates
I have not yet chosen a template as that is on the following page.

### Rather Drive Stick?
To quote the auto-generator, "If you prefer to not use the automatic generator, push a branch named `gh-pages` to your repository to create a page manually."

### Authors and Contributors
So far, @MatrixCat has been the main contributor to IFS_2D however anyone and everyone is welcome to contribute.

### Support or Contact
Apparently, if I have any issues with the gh-pages, I should look at https://help.github.com/pages
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
